_PAGE_FILTER_FLOAT_ARGUMENTS_VALUE_: The numeric value to be formatted
_PAGE_FILTER_FLOAT_ARGUMENTS_SUFFIX_: A suffix to be added after the numeric value
_PAGE_FILTER_FLOAT_ARGUMENTS_DIGITS_: The number of decimal places after the comma
_PAGE_FILTER_FLOAT_ARGUMENTS_DIGIT_GROUP: A flag indicating whether digit grouping should be applied (thousands separator)
_PAGE_FILTER_FLOAT_DESCRIPTION_: The function filterFloat formats numeric values according to the specified parameters. It takes a numeric value and returns it as a string with the specified number of decimal places, a suffix, and optional digit grouping (thousands separator). If the numeric value is not specified (null or undefined), an empty string is returned.
